add.name: REGADMIN
add.title: Registration
add.description: Set Up Registration Admin settings

add.name: DataLoaderFormGroupId
add.description: This determines the Formgroup to be utilized by the Dataloader.

add.name: TableNameList
add.description: This determines the tables from the Table Editor to be exported by the Export tool.

add.name: CustomRegFormGroupsIds
add.description: List of formgroup IDs to be utilized by the application.

add.name: ActiveRLS
add.description: This setting enables Row Level Security which is an additional layer of security utilizing Oracle''s fine grain access control functionality.

add.name: ApprovalsEnabled
add.description: This setting enables the Approval workflow. Records are associated with an approval status and are managed by Administrators.

add.name: LockingEnabled
add.description: This setting enables the Locking workflow. Records are associated with locking status and are managed by Administrators.

add.name: SameBatchesIdentity
add.description: This setting allows different options to appear during the duplicate resolution workflow and determines whether or not batches can be added to existing records or if unique records are created instead.

add.name: CheckDuplication
add.description: This setting enables validation of duplication of structures and mixtures with identical compound before of the registration.

add.name: EnableMixtures
add.description: Enables managing more than one compound in a registry record.

add.name: AllowUnregisteredComponentsInMixtures
add.description: Allows components to be added to Mixtures without registering components.

add.name: EnableSubmissionTemplates
add.description: Enables the ability to save and load submission data prior to actual submission or registration.

add.name: EnableSubmissionDuplicateChecking
add.description: Enables duplicate checking to occur when records are submitted and requires suggested action from submitter.

add.name: EnableFragments
add.description: Enable the use of fragments to track salts and solvates

add.name: EnableMoveBatch
add.description: Allows reasigning batches between registry records

add.name: EnableAddBatchButton
add.description: Controls the display of Add Batch button during component duplicate resolution

add.name: EnableDuplicateButton
add.description: Controls the display of Duplicate button during component duplicate resolution

add.name: EnableUseComponentButton
add.description: Controls the display of Use Component button during component duplicate resolution

add.name: EnableUseStructureButton
add.description: Controls the display of Use Structure button during component duplicate resolution

add.name: AllowCreateCopySharedStructure
add.description: Allow to create copies of edited linked structures

add.name: EnableAuditing
add.description: Allow logging registry record's change history

add.name: BatchHighlightingField
add.description: In combination with BachHighlightingValue configures a rule to highlight those batches that has a specific value for a given field

add.name: BatchHighlightingValue
add.description: In combination with BachHighlightingField configures a rule to highlight those batches that has a specific value for a given field

add.name: BatchHighlightingTooltip
add.description: If a batch is highlithed this tooltip would tell the user why it was highlighted

add.name: EnableUseBatchPrefixes
add.description: Enables the use of batch level prefixes rather than registry level prefix

add.name: DefaultBatchPrefix
add.description: Default Batch Prefix ID used for non-UI temporary or permanent registration through bulkloading or webservice

add.name: FragmentSortField
add.description: Set the value to sort fragments in ascending order

add.name: DUPLICATE_CHECKING
add.title: Duplicate Checking
add.description: Set Up Duplicate Checking Rules

add.name: ABSOLUTEHITSREL
add.description: This setting determines if duplicate checking should absolute hits into account

add.name: DOUBLEBONDSTEREO
add.description: This setting determines if duplicate checking should take double bonds into account

add.name: FRAGMENTSOVERLAP
add.description: This setting determines if duplicate checking should take overlapping fragments into account.

add.name: HITANYCHARGECARBON
add.description: This setting determines if duplicate checking should take charged carbons into account

add.name: HITANYCHARGEHETERO
add.description: This setting determines if duplicate checking should take charged atoms into account.

add.name: IDENTITY
add.description: This setting determines if duplicate checking should use identity matching

add.name: PERMITEXTRANEOUSFRAGMENTS
add.description: This setting determines if duplicate checking should take permit extraneous fragments into account.

add.name: PERMITEXTRANEOUSFRAGMENTSIFRXN
add.description: This setting determines if duplicate checking should take permit extraneous fragments into account when analyzing a reaction.

add.name: RELATIVETETSTEREO
add.description: This setting determines if duplicate checking should take relative Tetrahedral Stereo into account

add.name: TAUTOMER
add.description: This setting determines if duplicate checking should tautomers into account

add.name: TETRAHEDRALSTEREO
add.description: This setting determines if duplicate checking should take Tetrahedral Stereochemistry into account

add.name: LooseDelocalization
add.description: This setting determines if duplicate checking should take loose delocalization into account.

add.name: CBV
add.title: Search
add.description: Set Up ChemBioViz settings

add.name: SearchEngineURL
add.description: URL to perform search.

add.name: ReviewRegisterSearchFormGroupId
add.description: Defines the form id for reviewing pending temp registries.

add.name: ViewRegistrySearchFormGroupId
add.description: Defines the form id for search temp registries.

add.name: SendToRegistrationFormGroupId
add.description: Bulk Register of temp registries

add.name: ELNReviewRegisterSearchFormGroupId
add.description: Defines the form id for reviewing pending temp registries.

add.name: ELNViewRegistrySearchFormGroupId
add.description: Defines the form id for search temp registries.

add.name: DeleteLogFormGroupId
add.description: Defines the form id for delete marked registries.

add.name: SubmitRegistryFormGroupId
add.description: Defines the form id for submit registries.

add.name: ReviewRegisterRegistryFormGroupId
add.description: Defines the form id for review and edit registries.

add.name: ViewRegistryFormGroupId
add.description: Defines the form id for review and edit temp registries.

add.name: ComponentDuplicatesFormGroupId
add.description: Defines the form id for duplicates components.

add.name: RegistryDuplicatesFormGroupId
add.description: Defines the form id for duplicates registries.

add.name: DataLoaderFormGroupId
add.description: Defines the from id for Data Loader

add.name: SearchComponentsToAddFormGroupId
add.description: Search components to add in Submit Registry section

add.name: SearchComponentsToAddRRFormGroupId
add.description: Search components to add in Review Register section

add.name: SearchComponentsToAddVMFormGroupId
add.description: Search components to add in View Mixture section

add.name: MarkedHitsMax
add.description: This setting is the maximum number of marked hits allowed by a user during a session.

add.name: ExpireHitlistHistoryDays
add.description: After the number of days specified, hitlist history entries are removed.

add.name: ExpireQueryHistoryDays
add.description: After the number of days specified, query history entries are removed.

add.name: SearchDuplicatesComponentsFormGroupId
add.description: Search Duplicates Components COEFormGroupId

add.name: InventoryIntegration
add.description: Allows to disable or enable the whole integration with inventory system

add.name: SendToInventoryURL
add.description: This setting is the default path to the page used for the Send to Inventory functionality. This page takes the data from the Registry record(s) and maps the data to matching Inventory values in order to create container(s).

add.name: SendtoInventory
add.description: This setting enables the user to send registration records to Inventory.

add.name: ShowRequestFromContainer
add.description: Configures whether to show the request material link from a specific container

add.name: ShowRequestFromBatch
add.description: Configures whether to show the request material link from a specific batch

add.name: ShowRequestMaterial
add.description: Configures whether to show the request material link from the record itself

add.name: UseFullContainerForm
add.description: Indicates if full container form is going to be used

add.name: ChemInvSchemaName
add.description: Configures ChemInv schema name

add.name: InvContainersDataviewID
add.description: Configures Inventory Containers dataviewid.

add.name: RequestMaterialURL
add.description: Configures Inventory url to request material

add.name: NewContainerURL
add.description: Configures Inventory url to create a new container

add.name: ViewContainerURL
add.description: Configures Inventory url to view a container

add.name: DOCMGR
add.title: DocManager
add.description: Set Up DocManager settings

add.name: DocMgrDataViewID
add.description: Defines the Doc Manager dataview id.

add.name: DocMgrSearchCriteriaField
add.description: Defines the Doc Manager search criteria field.

add.name: DocMgrFieldsToSearch
add.description: Defines the Doc Manager search fields.

add.name: DocMgrEnabled
add.description: Set enable/disable DocManager link. Allowed values [TRUE|FALSE]

add.name: MISC
add.title: Advanced
add.description: Set Up Miscellaneous settings

add.name: ENABLE_COEFORM_DEBUG_INFO
add.description: This setting, when enabled, displays pertinent debug information throughout the application.

add.name: LogoutUrl
add.description: Defines page url to redirect on user logout.

add.name: HomeLinkURL
add.description: Defines COEManager home page.

add.name: AppPageTitle
add.description: Defines application page tile.

add.name: PageControlsManager
add.description: When enabled, allows the Page Control Manager to be available.

add.name: Themes
add.description: Defines application theme color.

add.name: EnablePopUpForBrowserVersions
add.description: This setting defines which Internet Explorer browser versions will support popups of clean windows.

add.name: ClientName
add.description: This setting defines the Client (Customer) name to be displayed throughout the application, including the home page.

add.name: LogCategoryMessages
add.description: This setting defines the types of messages that will be available in log reports.

add.name: SimulationMode
add.description: Set enable/disable simulation mode. Allowed values [TRUE|FALSE].

add.name: LoginSimulationMode
add.description: Set enable/disable login simulation mode. Allowed values [TRUE|FALSE].

add.name: EnableSamePagesTitle
add.description: This setting allows the same page title to appear throughout the application.

add.name: CustomPropertyStyles
add.description: This setting defines the styles available for custom property fields.

add.name: AllowRDFileExport
add.description: This setting allows files with an RD file extension to be exported from the application. Note that RDfile is a file type used primarily for reactions, not individual substances.

add.name: AllowHitlistManagement
add.description: Determines if hitlist management can be accessed from the application. Hitlist management allows users to add, subtract, create the intersection, and union of hitlists.

add.name: MWROUNDDIGIT
add.description: This setting allows rounding of the calculated molecular weight based on the number of digits in the default value.

add.name: AllowQueryManagement
add.description: Determines if query management functionality will be visible through the interface. Query management allows users to view and manipulate previously submitted queries.

add.name: RXN_HIT_RXN_CENTER
add.description: Internal setting determining if duplicate checking should take the reaction center of a reaction into account

add.name: BatchesToTemp
add.description: Set to true, this setting allows users to add batches to temporary Registry records.

add.name: ProjectsUsed
add.description: Set to true, projects are linked to Registry records.

add.name: BatchProjectsUsed
add.description: Set to true, projects can be linked to specific batches of Registry records.

add.name: SitesUsed
add.description: Sites are assigned to sequences, so a particular site is related to a certain set of registry records. An administrator can create a relationship between a user and a site as well. This way, the user only has edit privileges to the registry records of the site that has been assigned to him.

add.name: WorkgroupsUsed
add.description: Workgroups are managed by setting the supervisor id of individual users to their supervisors person id. The workgroup settings impact what records can be edited by the logged in user.

add.name: AllowBatchforUnapprovedRecords
add.description: This setting determines whether or not batches can be added to unapproved compounds.

add.name: EmailAccount
add.description: Defines email account to send error messages.

add.name: EmailSubject
add.description: Defines email error subject.

add.name: HeaderText
add.description: Defines HeaderText error message.

add.name: HeaderTextClass
add.description: Defines HeaderText class.

add.name: BodyTextClass
add.description: Defines body text class.

add.name: FooterTextClass
add.description: Defines footer text class.

add.name: MaxRegisterMarked
add.description: Defines the maximum amount of records to register using register marked feature. The value 0 is reserved for not limiting it.

add.name: Registry_Identifiers
add.description: Enables/Disables Identifiers grid at Registry level

add.name: Component_Identifiers
add.description: Enables/Disables Identifiers grid at Component level

add.name: Batch_Identifiers
add.description: Enables/Disables Identifiers grid at Batch level

add.name: Structure_Identifiers
add.description: Enables/Disables Identifiers grid at Structure level

add.name: ENHANCED_DUPLICATE_SCAN
add.title: Extended Duplicate-checking
add.description: Configure property-based duplicate-checking in the absence of chemical structure data.

add.name: Level
add.description: The nesting level where the 'duplication' indicator is defined.

add.name: Type
add.description: The type of indicator used as the basis for 'property-based' duplicate-checking.

add.name: Value
add.description: The name of the indicator that, when a value is present, determines logical uniqueness.
